content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":248092,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その代わり、俺の友達になってもらうぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In return, you'll become my friend.\""},{"lineNumber":248093,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とも、だち……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"F-friend...\""},{"lineNumber":248094,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、握手握手。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here, a handshake."},{"lineNumber":248095,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これで俺と君は友達だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, you and I are friends."},{"lineNumber":248096,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がはははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":248097,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、それではエロエロなことを沢山……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright then, let's do lots of naughty things...\""},{"lineNumber":248098,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……くそ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... damn it..."},{"lineNumber":248099,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さすがに、もう限界だ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ve really hit my limit now...\""},{"lineNumber":248100,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せっかく……これから、楽しいこと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just when... from now on, fun things..."},{"lineNumber":248101,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いっぱい、しようと……思っていたのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was planning to do so many...\""},{"lineNumber":248102,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺が、寝て、も……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even if I sleep..."},{"lineNumber":248103,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺を起こすことは出来る、か……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can you wake me up...?\""},{"lineNumber":248104,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、うん……私がそう念じれば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yeah... if I think about it like that...\""},{"lineNumber":248105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なら安心だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then that’s a relief.\""},{"lineNumber":248106,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では少し……寝るから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, I’ll sleep a bit...\""},{"lineNumber":248107,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あとで……起こして……く、れ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wake me up... later... p-please...\""},{"lineNumber":248108,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、ちょ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, wait...!\""},{"lineNumber":248109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐうー……ぐうー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Zzz... zzz...\""},{"lineNumber":248110,"originalJapaneseLine":"「信じられない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I can’t believe it...\""},{"lineNumber":248111,"originalJapaneseLine":"「寝ちゃった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He fell asleep...\""},{"lineNumber":248112,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、そ、そうだ、ラッシー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, th-that's right, Lassie.\""},{"lineNumber":248113,"originalJapaneseLine":"ワーグは倒れたラッシーの無事を確認して、","translatedEnglishLine":"Warg checked that the collapsed Lassie was unharmed,"},{"lineNumber":248114,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホッと胸をなで下ろした。","translatedEnglishLine":"and breathed a sigh of relief."},{"lineNumber":248115,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう、ようやく落ち着いたー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew, I finally calmed down.\""},{"lineNumber":248116,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それにしても、素っ頓狂な人間だなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Still, what a bizarre human being.\""},{"lineNumber":248117,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人ワーグを殺す為に戦うんじゃなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He wasn’t fighting to kill the demon Warg,"},{"lineNumber":248118,"originalJapaneseLine":"　友達になる為に戦っていたんだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"he was fighting to become friends.\""},{"lineNumber":248119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s right...\""},{"lineNumber":248120,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、別に珍しくないわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But it’s not unusual...\""},{"lineNumber":248121,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私と友達になろうとした人は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There have been several people who tried to become my friends,"},{"lineNumber":248122,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今までにも何人かいたわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"even up until now.\""},{"lineNumber":248123,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この男だけが特別なんかじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This guy isn’t special.\""},{"lineNumber":248124,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、どうするのー、この男ー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what will you do with this guy?\""},{"lineNumber":248125,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何もしなければいいのよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just do nothing."},{"lineNumber":248126,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それだけでこの男は殺したも同然だもの」","translatedEnglishLine":"That alone is as good as killing him.\""},{"lineNumber":248127,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それでいいの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Is that really okay?\""},{"lineNumber":248128,"originalJapaneseLine":"「黙りなさい、ラッシー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Be quiet, Lassie.\""},{"lineNumber":248129,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今までにも何人もの人が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Many people have tried to become friends with me,"},{"lineNumber":248130,"originalJapaneseLine":"　友達になろうとしてくれて……","translatedEnglishLine":"They tried to be my friends..."},{"lineNumber":248131,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最後は皆離れて行ったけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"In the end, they all left though...\""},{"lineNumber":248132,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、もしかしたら、今度こそ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But maybe, this time for sure...\""},{"lineNumber":248133,"originalJapaneseLine":"「友達になれるかも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I might be able to make a friend...\""},{"lineNumber":248134,"originalJapaneseLine":"「黙りなさい！　ラッシー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Be quiet! Lassie!\""},{"lineNumber":248135,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":248136,"originalJapaneseLine":"クシャリとワーグは前髪を握った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Warg grasped Lassie’s bangs tightly."},{"lineNumber":248137,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これだから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s why..."} ,
{"lineNumber":248138,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間は嫌いなのよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I hate humans...\""},{"lineNumber":248139,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":248140,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラッシー……貴方が決めて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lassie... you decide...\""},{"lineNumber":248141,"originalJapaneseLine":"ポンと、ワーグがラッシーに触れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"With a pat, Warg touched Lassie."},{"lineNumber":248142,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":248143,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":248144,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日はワーグに会いに行くぞー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Today, we’re going to visit Warg!\""},{"lineNumber":248145,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, Lord Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":248146,"originalJapaneseLine":"城から地上に降り、","translatedEnglishLine":"They descended from the castle to the ground,"},{"lineNumber":248147,"originalJapaneseLine":"CITYの裏手から山道をしばらく進むと、","translatedEnglishLine":"and after proceeding along a mountain path behind the city for some time,"},{"lineNumber":248148,"originalJapaneseLine":"一軒の小さな民家が見えてきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"a small house came into view."},{"lineNumber":248149,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほほう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh ho...\""},{"lineNumber":248150,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが案内された家の中をグルリと見回した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance looked around inside the house he was led to."},{"lineNumber":248151,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむふむ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm hmm...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その代わり、俺の友達になってもらうぞ」
これで俺と君は友達だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, you and I are friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、それではエロエロなことを沢山……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright then, let's do lots of naughty things..."
I’ve really hit my limit now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せっかく……これから、楽しいこと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just when... from now on, fun things...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いっぱい、しようと……思っていたのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was planning to do so many..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺を起こすことは出来る、か……？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, yeah... if I think about it like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグは倒れたラッシーの無事を確認して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Warg checked that the collapsed Lassie was unharmed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホッと胸をなで下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and breathed a sigh of relief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふう、ようやく落ち着いたー」
「それにしても、素っ頓狂な人間だなー」
「魔人ワーグを殺す為に戦うんじゃなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He wasn’t fighting to kill the demon Warg,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 友達になる為に戦っていたんだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was fighting to become friends."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私と友達になろうとした人は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There have been several people who tried to become my friends,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までにも何人かいたわ」
「この男だけが特別なんかじゃない」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, what will you do with this guy?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけでこの男は殺したも同然だもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That alone is as good as killing him."
"Many people have tried to become friends with me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 友達になろうとしてくれて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They tried to be my friends...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後は皆離れて行ったけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, they all left though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、もしかしたら、今度こそ……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I might be able to make a friend..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クシャリとワーグは前髪を握った。
ポンと、ワーグがラッシーに触れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a pat, Warg touched Lassie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日はワーグに会いに行くぞー」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They descended from the castle to the ground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: CITYの裏手から山道をしばらく進むと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and after proceeding along a mountain path behind the city for some time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一軒の小さな民家が見えてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a small house came into view.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが案内された家の中をグルリと見回した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance looked around inside the house he was led to.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:
